src:
A network of science: 150 years of Nature papers
Exclusive analysis explores Nature’s multidisciplinary history.
06 Nov 2019 by Noah Baker



Science is a network, each paper linking those that came before with those that followed. In this video, we dive into an analysis of Nature's part of that network. We explore the network, taking you on a tour of 150 years of interconnected, interdisciplinary research, as represented by Nature's publication record.
doi: 10.1038/d41586-019-03325-6

A network of science: 150 years of Nature papers
Exclusive analysis explores Nature’s multidisciplinary history.
06 Nov 2019 by Noah Baker



Science is a network, each paper linking those that came before with those that followed. In this video, we dive into an analysis of Nature's part of that network. We explore the network, taking you on a tour of 150 years of interconnected, interdisciplinary research, as represented by Nature's publication record.
